info.name: User usage report
info.summary: Provides a command which generates a report about all the users and their usage
info.description:
Provides a command which generates a report about all the users and their usage:
``` $ sudo -u www-data ./occ usage-report:generate admin "admin","2017-09-18T09:00:01+00:00",5368709120,786432000,12,1,1,2 ```
To include the header of the fields in the CSV use the `--verbose` option:
``` $ sudo -u www-data ./occ usage-report:generate --verbose admin "user-id","date as 'c'","assigned quota (5 GB)","used quota (500 MB)",number of files,number of shares,number of uploads,number of downloads "admin","2017-09-18T09:00:01+00:00",5368709120,786432000,12,1,1,2 ```
info.author: Joas Schilling
